name: Death By Player
description: Being killed by another player will now cause you to lose a minimum of 2.5% of your experience.

name: Skull
description:
You have attacked a player.
The skull last 1 minute if the player didn't die.
The skull last 10 minutes if the player dies.

name: White Skull
description:
You have attacked a player without skull.
Dying with a white skull will cause you to lose 7.5% of your experience.

name: Yellow Skull
description:
You have attacked a player with a white or red skull.
Being killed with a yellow skull by the player you attacked will cause you to lose 5% of your experience, This has changed so you now do not lose exp with a yellow skull if you are not killed by the person you attacked to give you the skull in the first place.

name: Red Skull
description:
Killing more than 10 players in 7 days will result in you becoming an outlaw. Outlaws are marked with a red skull, And this skull will persist until you have 7 or fewer unjust kills tracked against your character.
Dying with a red skull will cause you to lose 15% of your experience.

name: Black Skull
description:
Killing more than 20 players in 7 days will result in you becoming an outlaw. Outlaws are marked with a black skull, And this skull will persist until you have 20 or fewer unjust kills tracked against your character.
Dying with a black skull will cause you to lose 30% of your experience.

name: Party Kill
description:
Killing party member's does not count as an unjust killing.
Killing party member's does not count as an unjust killing.

name: Monster kill
description: If you die to a monster and do not have a skull you will not lose any experience.
